channel.title: 6502 on Ujkan Sulejmani
channel.description: Recent content in 6502 on Ujkan Sulejmani

item.title: 6502 Assembly - Fibonacci
item.description: Introduction I’ve been learning some 6502 assembly (streams) and most recently I implemented a subroutine to calculate the n-th Fibonacci number. What is 6502? The MOS Technology 6502 (typically pronounced “sixty-five-oh-two”) is an 8-bit microprocessor L I implemented a subroutine that calculates the n-th Fibonacci number in 6502 assembly. Here’s the code define N_loc $01fd define fpp_loc $01fc define fp_loc $01fb fib: TXA PHA ; stores N in the stack, loc $01fd since $01fe ; and $01ff are ret.
